FAQs

Who is Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil?

Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil is an Indian actor and producer, born on 07 September, 1951 in Chandiroor, Alappuzha, Kerala, India.

How old is Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil?

Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil is 72 years old as of February 2024.

How tall is Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil?

Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil is 5 feet 10 inches (1.78 m).
